title: My Portfolio
description: An Internet Relay Chat (IRC) program designed for users of a popular video streaming website, Twitch.
points: Implemented a simple IRC bot by Java TCP socket packages.
Learned to write a GUI program with JAVA Swing.
Analyzed and handled customized IRC control messages made by Twitch.

screenshots.caption: simulate "delete banned messages" functionality on Twitch.tv
has ability to parse Twitch-customized messages and display nickname colors
